description:
Welcome to Akiran, a world of adventure and wonder. This world is populated by a magical blend of elves, orcs and humans living peacefully side by side. The vibrant forests of Akiran have been home to the elves for centuries, and are full of secrets and ancient magicks. The orcs live in the mountains and have become particularly adept at metalworking, forging powerful weapons and armor for sale to the other races. The human cities are full of opportunity and bustling activity, with sailors from all over the world plying the waters of the sea. 

In Akiran, the distinctive currency known as gold dominates the economy. Merchants from around the world flock to Akiran to buy and sell goods with their gilded coins. Wealth abounds in Akiran, allowing adventurers to outfit themselves with the latest armor, weapons, and other magical items.  In Akiran, you can find adventure around every corner, explore the unknown, and make your fortune!
name: Akiran

locations.name: Valley of Iron

characters.name: Lyra
characters.description: Lyra is a wild and adventurous spirit, always looking for the next challenge. Growing up as a part of the orc tribe living in the Valley of Iron, they had a knack for climbing and exploring the dangerous terrain of their home. This passion and drive led them to seek out their own personal goal: to find and wield the legendary orcish sword hidden in the mountains. Even though the odds are stacked against them, Lyra will stop at nothing to fulfill their dream and make their mark on the world. With their dragon pet by their side, nothing can deter them from their ultimate goal.

locations.description: The Valley of Iron is a mysterious and treacherous area in Akiran's mountain range. It has long been the home of the orcs, and their skill in metalworking is renowned around the world. The steep cliffs and deep crevasses are filled with hidden caves, tunnels and workshops that have been used for centuries by the orcs to craft their powerful weapons and armor. Legends say that in the Valley of Iron lies one of the greatest pieces of orcish craftsmanship of all time, a powerful sword that has never been wielded by anyone before. Its secrets remain hidden, and adventurers brave enough to venture into the Valley will certainly find danger and treasure alike.
